ASTRONAUT.name: Astronaut
ASTRONAUT.description: There are four available astronauts. At least two of must be taken to pilot the Shuttle on each mission. Astronauts are not considered scientists.

ASTRONOMER.name: Astronomer
ASTRONOMER.description: A scientist with a solid  knowledge of the cosmos, including galaxies and solar systems outside our own.

BIOLOGIST.name: Biologist
BIOLOGIST.description: A scientist knowledgeable in all aspects of biology, including the study of the relationship of man to tools and their use.

ENGINEER.name: Engineer
ENGINEER.description: A scientist with a solid knowledge of how things work, both mechanically and electronically.

PHYSICIST.name: Physicist
PHYSICIST.description: A scientist specializing in high energy propulsion systems.

SEMANTICIST.name: Semanticist
SEMANTICIST.description: A scientist specializing in symbols, words, language, and interrelationships among them.
